text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, did you hear? You know, about<n>the scrimmage this
weekend.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Right, the one Narita Taishin's going<n>to race in. "Another
chance to see<n>what she's really made of," was it?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone at the academy knows<n>about the scrimmage
thanks to<n>Winning Ticket and her days-long<n>spree of
shouting all around campus.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But the reactions to the big news are<n>mixed.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide is precise, and<n>Winning Ticket runs like a
rocket. And<n>it isn't just them... The other racers<n>have
been training just as hard.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
There's no way Taishin's winning<n>this. I just hope she
doesn't overdo it<n>and get hurt.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I try approaching the glum-looking<n>racer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's close with Biwa Hayahide and<n>Winning Ticket, so
she probably<n>knows more about their<n>much-talked-about
abilities than most.
choice_data_list: You must be feeling the pressure.
You must be feeling the pressure.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Who asked you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She looks grim, but I still remember<n>that video—her fiery
sprint down the<n>homestretch.
choice_data_list:
You don't need to get caught up in the fight for
position.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Excuse me? Who do you think<n>you're talking to?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You mean I'm already a disgrace? So<n>I should just lose
without making a<n>damn fuss?!
choice_data_list: Wait! I mean, if you don't fight, you can win!
Wait! I mean, if you don't fight, you can win!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: Take it slow in the beginning.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That's insane... If I let the big runners<n>like Hayahide get
ahead, I'll never<n>catch up!
choice_data_list:
With your breakaway speed, you can overtake
anyone!

With your breakaway speed, you can overtake
anyone!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I don't get it... What are yougetting all bothered for?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I'm not sure if she really got my<n>advice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But it's too late now—the gates are<n>opening!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Clank!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wow... Biwa Hayahide's off in<n>excellent form. She's got a
nice<n>position in the front.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket too. Must be in a good<n>mood 'cause she
knows so many of<n>the racers! I can't wait to see her in<n>
the last stretch!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Narita Taishin's way in back... I<n>wonder if she tripped
up her start.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(Crap, I can't take this. The front's<n>getting blocked off... It's
like a wall.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "You don't need to get caught up in<n>the fight for position."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "Take it slow in the beginning."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "Wait! I mean, if you don't fight, you<n>can win!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "Wait! I mean, if you don't fight, you<n>can win!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "With your breakaway speed, you<n>can overtake anyone!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "With your breakaway speed, you<n>can overtake anyone!"

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Fine.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Here it is, the last corner! Ah, Winning<n>Ticket's coming up
fast!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: RAAAAAGH! FULL SPEED<n>AHEEEAD!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Heh, as I predicted, Winning Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It's Biwa Hayahide and Winning<n>Ticket! Will it come down
to a fight<n>between those two powerhouses?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Wait! From the outside!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Haaaaargh!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Narita Taishin?! Look at that burst of<n>speed!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(This is it—don't lose focus! Keep<n>your eyes on me! Watch
me do this!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (I'm Narita Taishin, a trueborn racer!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's even more focused than in the<n>video... Like a blade
forged from all her<n>willpower and perseverance, she cuts<n>
straight to the front.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone holds their breath as it<n>ends, and Narita Taishin
wins a close<n>finish. Following her are Biwa<n>Hayahide and
Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's more than enough to make her<n>full potential known—a
truly stunning<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Well, looks like I still have some<n>studying to do. How could I
misjudge<n>a racer like her?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh! I looost!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Knock it off. I can't deal with your<n>painful whining so soon
after a race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But, but, but! I went all out! I really<n>thought I was gonna be
all like, "Yay, I<n>won," like always!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But... I just couldn't keep up with<n>you! I'm still burning with
excitement!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's why! We should definitely, no,ABSOLUTELY race again witheverything we've got!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ticket...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Haha. No thanks, I can't take<n>anymore of your screaming,
dummy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I believe we've communicated our<n>reasons for wanting to
help well<n>enough.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hayahide...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
None of us can afford to lose our<n>most powerful rivals here.
We're in<n>this together.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Enough with the touchy-feely talk.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The commotion dies down, and Narita<n>Taishin hesitantly
walks over to me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Um... Hey.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: So, Ticket put words in your mouththe other day, but uh... If youreally, um, y'know... You can sayit now.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
NO, you idiot! I'll kick your ass! I<n>mean, whether you want
to...
choice_data_list: Yes! I want to scout you!
Yes! I want to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Sure.
